p: MDCK cells were seeded into white, flat-bottom, 96-well CulturPlates (PerkinElmer) at a density of 10,000 cells/well and cultured at 37 °C overnight. The next day, the cells were washed with PBS twice, followed by inoculation of the PR8-Gluc virus. Infections were performed in Opti-MEM containing 2 µg/mL N-tosyl-L-phenylalanine chloromethyl ketone (TPCK)–trypsin (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA).
